dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare to approach me, puny human?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I only seek peaceful resolution.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peaceful? Ha! Your pleas will not save you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Let's try to understand each other.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Understanding is for the weak. Prepare for your demise.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I won't back down without a fight.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As you wish. Face the wrath of the Hellfire Beast!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I choose to retreat for now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your cowardice will not go unpunished. Feel my flames!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense fear in your aggression.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Fear? I fear nothing. Feel the heat of my rage!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you to a duel.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A duel it is then. Let the battle begin!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer you an alliance against a common enemy.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An alliance with a weakling like you? Ridiculous! Begone!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your power is impressive, we should not be enemies.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Impressive? You flatter yourself. Prepare to face destruction!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I stand my ground, ready for whatever comes.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. You will regret your defiance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer you a trade instead of conflict.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A trade? I have no need for your trinkets. Feel the burn of my wrath!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am not here to provoke you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Provocation or not, you will suffer the consequences.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek a way to coexist peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peaceful coexistence? Not in my domain. Face oblivion!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I propose a truce between us.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A truce with a pathetic creature like you? Absurd! Face my wrath!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am willing to leave if it pleases you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your departure is the only acceptable outcome. Leave!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I acknowledge your power and seek no conflict.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Acknowledgement means nothing in the face of destruction.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you to a test of strength.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A test of strength it is. Prepare for annihilation!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer to share knowledge and learn from each other.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge from a weakling? Laughable! Face annihilation!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, seeking only understanding.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Understanding with a fool like you? I shall teach you pain!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I request a chance to prove my intentions.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Proof? Your actions speak louder. Feel the flames of punishment!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer a gift as a gesture of goodwill.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A gift? I have no use for your trinkets. Face your demise!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your power is unmatched, I come with respect.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect or not, you shall kneel before me.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I acknowledge your authority and bow before you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Acknowledgement means nothing. Kneel before the Hellfire Beast!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer you a tribute in exchange for peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A tribute from a mere mortal? Insolence! Prepare for annihilation!
